name: marrakech-guide-scripts
description: Shared content pipeline scripts for Marrakech Guide

scripts.validate: if command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1; then bun run validate-content.ts; else tsx validate-content.ts; fi
scripts.build-bundle: if command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1; then bun run build-bundle.ts; else echo 'Error: bun is required for build-bundle.ts (uses bun:sqlite)' >&2; exit 1; fi
scripts.check-links: if command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1; then bun run check-links.ts; else tsx check-links.ts; fi
scripts.check-l10n: if command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1; then bun run check-localization-parity.ts; else tsx check-localization-parity.ts; fi
scripts.test:l10n: if command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1; then bun run check-localization-parity.test.ts; else tsx check-localization-parity.test.ts; fi
